001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.HistoryLogProps;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006
007@HistoryLogProps(
008    opCode = 230, // -26
009    displayName = "ControlIQ Pump Control Mode (PCM) Change",
010    internalName = "LID_AA_PCM_CHANGE",
011    usedByTidepool = true // LID_AA_PCM_CHANGE
012)
013public class ControlIQPcmChangeHistoryLog extends HistoryLog {
014    
015    private int currentPcmId;
016    private int previousPcmId;
017
018    private PCM currentPcm;
019    private PCM previousPcm;
020    
021    public ControlIQPcmChangeHistoryLog() {}
022    public ControlIQPcmChangeHistoryLog(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, int currentPcmId, int previousPcmId) {
023        super(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum);
024        this.cargo = buildCargo(pumpTimeSec, sequenceNum, currentPcmId, previousPcmId);
025        this.currentPcmId = currentPcmId;
026        this.previousPcmId = previousPcmId;
027        
028    }
029
030    public ControlIQPcmChangeHistoryLog(int currentPcmId, int previousPcmId) {
031        this(0, 0, currentPcmId, previousPcmId);
032    }
033
034    public int typeId() {
035        return 230;
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * <table border="1">
040     * <caption>Parsed fields for ControlIQPcmChangeHistoryLog:</caption>
041     * <tr><td><code>currentPcmId</code></td><td><code>raw[10]</code></td></tr>
042     * <tr><td><code>previousPcmId</code></td><td><code>raw[11]</code></td></tr>
043     * <tr><td><code>currentPcm</code></td><td><code>PCM.fromId(currentPcmId)</code></td></tr>
044     * <tr><td><code>previousPcm</code></td><td><code>PCM.fromId(previousPcmId)</code></td></tr>
045     * </table>
046     */
047    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
048        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == 26);
049        this.cargo = raw;
050        parseBase(raw);
051        this.currentPcmId = raw[10];
052        this.previousPcmId = raw[11];
053        this.currentPcm = PCM.fromId(currentPcmId);
054        this.previousPcm = PCM.fromId(previousPcmId);
055        
056    }
057
058    public static byte[] buildCargo(long pumpTimeSec, long sequenceNum, int currentPcm, int previousPcm) {
059        return HistoryLog.fillCargo(Bytes.combine(
060            new byte[]{-26, 0}, // (byte) 230
061            Bytes.toUint32(pumpTimeSec),
062            Bytes.toUint32(sequenceNum),
063            new byte[]{ (byte) currentPcm }, 
064            new byte[]{ (byte) previousPcm }));
065    }
066    public int getCurrentPcmId() {
067        return currentPcmId;
068    }
069    public int getPreviousPcmId() {
070        return previousPcmId;
071    }
072
073    public PCM getCurrentPcm() {
074        return PCM.fromId(currentPcmId);
075    }
076
077    public PCM getPreviousPcm() {
078        return PCM.fromId(previousPcmId);
079    }
080
081    public enum PCM {
082        NO_CONTROL(0),
083        OPEN_LOOP(1),
084        CGM_INACTIVE(2),
085        CLOSED_LOOP(3),
086
087        ;
088
089        private final int id;
090        PCM(int id) {
091            this.id = id;
092        }
093
094        public static PCM fromId(int id) {
095            for (PCM s : values()) {
096                if (s.id == id) {
097                    return s;
098                }
099            }
100            return null;
101        }
102
103        public int getId() {
104            return id;
105        }
106    }
107    
108}
